org.gvsig.raster.impl.buffer

Class BufferHistogramComputer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gvsig.raster.impl.buffer.BufferHistogramComputer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BaseIncrementableTask, IncrementableTask, HistogramComputer

    public class BufferHistogramComputer
extends Object
implements HistogramComputer
    This class computes the histogram for a Buffer

    • Method Detail

      • setScaleHistogram

        public void setScaleHistogram(double scale)
        Description copied from interface: HistogramComputer
        This value represents the percentage of the image that will be used for this process. The default value is one, that means that the entire image will be processed
        Specified by:
        setScaleHistogram in interface HistogramComputer
